Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAi - I used to roughly guide my thinking (i.e. naming a funding proposal/program that I already have the framework for)
Teacher - used for reliable information re hitting the rubric for assignments.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I was more open to asking GenAI questions in terms of frequency and even if it was stupid. I would be careful when emailing the proffessor in case the questions has already been answered elsewhere (course profile, discussion board, lectures, readings).

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Response time and depth of feedback from GenAI was much better but also less reliable - so while I had to take everything with a grain of salt, I also accessed it more frequently and clarified facts I was unsure of in class or through emailing the proffessor.
